doc.previous: Post World War II performing arts were highlighted by the resurgence of both ballet and opera in the Western world  In the 1930s Jean Rosenthal introduced what would become modern stage lighting changing the nature of the stage as the Broadway musical became a phenomenon in the United States
doc.after: Postmodernism in performing arts dominated the 1960s to large extent
